<b>Signature:</b>


## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [clientID](./extension-collaboration.collaborationextensionoptions.clientid.md) | <code>number &#124; string</code> | The unique ID of the client connecting to the server. |
